Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Bracelet
Description: Bracelet worn around the left arm of the deceased in a Middle Kerma tomb. It is a very simple object: a strip of leather with thinned and rounded extremities that were pierced to allow a string to attach the two ends together.  It is simply decorated with three incised lines.
